display_title: Meal-Prep Breakfast Pack | Freezer Muffin Plan

tables.title: The 3-step freezer method
rows: Cool on wire rack for 2 hours. Never freeze hot muffins-condensation ruins texture.
Wrap individually, then place in freezer bag. Label with date. Lasts 90 days.
Microwave at 50% power with damp paper towel. Perfect texture every time.
